Text: RE Conf call with Cameron and Iannotes to discuss tomorrow Background Late March we met with members of GSS Global Strategic Sourcing group and the CIO from ETS Enron Transportation Services Mid May we showed a demo to a mix of EES Enron Energy Services GSS John Gillespie John Will Craig Brown and ETS contacts EES and ETS were interested mentioned DealBench as too costly for their needs we followed with a proposal to GSS for a Pilot response was that we need to get a divisions on board Late June met with contacts from EES Procurement Mgrs who were in the May mtg they suggested we show how our system can help their upstream counterparts who structure the deals since the Proc Mgrs are simply the downstream execution piece they also mentioned that GSS is busy with SAPC ibuyit rollout right now Questions Who are the deal makers what is their function what tools do they use how do we best position our solution with them How are decisions made Should we target a solution to a particular division eg EES Our contacts have said solutions are purchased both through GSS as a gatekeeper and by a single divison on its own as there seems to be a number of maverick projects going on at the moment Original Message From Robin Deguara Sent Thursday July AM To Cameron Sellers Subject FW Conf call with Cameron and Ian Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday July AM To Robin Deguara Subject Re Conf call with Cameron and Ian AM AM PM Best Jeff Robin Deguara erfec To tcom cc Subject Conf call with Cameron and Ian PM Jeff Please provide me with three time slots you would be available to have a conf call on Friday the th between Cameron and Ian Thank you Robin Deguara Executive Assistant OLEObj Perfect Commerce Inc tel fax email

RE Conf call with Cameron and Iannotes to discuss tomorrow Background Late March we met with members of GSS Global Strategic Sourcing group and the CIO from ETS Enron Transportation Services Mid May we showed a demo to a mix of EES Enron Energy Services GSS John Gillespie John Will Craig Brown and ETS contacts EES and ETS were interested mentioned DealBench as too costly for their needs we followed with a proposal to GSS for a Pilot response was that we need to get a divisions on board Late June met with contacts from EES Procurement Mgrs who were in the May mtg they suggested we show how our system can help their upstream counterparts who structure the deals since the Proc Mgrs are simply the downstream execution piece they also mentioned that GSS is busy with SAPC ibuyit rollout right now Questions Who are the deal makers what is their function what tools do they use how do we best position our solution with them How are decisions made Should we target a solution to a particular division eg EES Our contacts have said solutions are purchased both through GSS as a gatekeeper and by a single divison on its own as there seems to be a number of maverick projects going on at the moment Original Message From Robin Deguara Sent Thursday July AM To Cameron Sellers Subject FW Conf call with Cameron and Ian Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday July AM To Robin Deguara Subject Re Conf call with Cameron and Ian AM AM PM Best Jeff Robin Deguara erfec To tcom cc Subject Conf call with Cameron and Ian PM Jeff Please provide me with three time slots you would be available to have a conf call on Friday the th between Cameron and Ian Thank you Robin Deguara Executive Assistant OLEObj Perfect Commerce Inc tel fax email
